column4: i just made a fresh install of 7.04 .. i've installed nvidia-glx and defined nvidia as the the driver to be used for the current device.. however, and mind you that this is on a completely fresh install, it says that there is an api mismatch and the nvidia kernel module is the wrong version. how do i fix it?
which nvidia version did you install
it says that the kernel module is version 1.0-9631 and the x module is 1.0-9755 .. if its any help
